amendment.description: Amendment modifies the Osborne Mentoring Program so that both adults and qualified, trained and motivated high school students can become mentors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 107-69 to amend the Osborne Mentoring Program so that both adults and qualified, trained and motivated high school students can be mentors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meek (FL) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
